channel.title: Getting Started on Clipper
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Clipper

item.title: Quickstart
item.description: The easiest way to get started using Clipper is to install the clipper_admin pip package and use it interactively from a Python REPL. The clipper-admin package contains the Clipper manager which can be used to start and manage a Clipper instance. Dependencies: Before using Clipper, you must install Docker and Docker Compose and the Anaconda Python distribution. $ pip install clipper_admin $ python Once you have the clipper_admin package installed, you can use it to start a Clipper instance and deploy your first model.
